price: (mereka Kami utus) dengan membawa keterangan-keterangan (mukjizat) dan kitab-kitab. Dan Kami turunkan Aż-Żikr (Alquran) kepadamu, agar engkau menerangkan kepada manusia apa yang telah diturunkan kepada mereka455) dan agar mereka memikirkan.
arabic: بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلزُّبُرِۗ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: *455) Yakni perintah, larangan, aturan dan lain-lain yang terdapat dalam Alquran.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: bil-bayināti wal-zuburi wa-anzalnā ilayka al-dhik'ra litubayyina lilnnāsi mā nuzzila ilayhim walaʿallahum yatafakkarūna
